      • getPost

        public java.util.List<Post> getPost​(User user,
                                    int pageNo,
                                    int recPerPage)
        To retrieve a list of post posted by user. It allow user to load limitted no. of records at one time If Image file, system will retrieve image file as byte[]
        Specified by:
        getPost in interface IPostManager
        Parameters:
        user - - user who own the post
        pageNo - - page no. user is currently at
        recPerPage - - no. of record shown on screen, To show all, set this to 0

      • submitPost

        public Post submitPost​(Post post)
        To submit post If Image post, system will save the file to folder and save file name in database
        Specified by:
        submitPost in interface IPostManager
        Parameters:
        post - - post to be inserted
